issue.title: Fix issue #5567
issue.body: This fixes #5567. Tested manually with the test snipped provided in the description of #5567.

body:
Anyway,

```php
$array = [];                                                                                             
$array['self'] = &$array;
```
the output for the above array is also wrong:

```console
1) ExporterTest::testAnythingThatFailsWithRecursiveArray
Failed asserting that Array &0 [
    'self' => Array &1 [
        'self' => Array &1,
    ],
] is false.
```

I'd rather expect just:

```console
1) ExporterTest::testAnythingThatFailsWithRecursiveArray
Failed asserting that Array &0 [
   'self' => Array &0,
] is false.
```
But this is actually Exporter's issue.

Hi,

is it worth to be work on?

I've actually attempted to help with this in #5569, but it was suddenly closed.

rename.from: Recursive arrays cause segmentation fault for phpunit >= 10.4
rename.to: Infinite recursion when recursive / self-referencing arrays are checked whether they contain only scalar values
